data.message: hi fb i have 1 question fb how verifiy my fb page plz answer plzzzz

replies.message: Hi there, MěHrðsé. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1MxSKXh. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1MxSKXd. Hope this helps! -Kate
